imap-backup.versionsNewScript: Invoke-RestMethod https://rubygems.org/api/v1/versions/imap-backup.json | % { $_.number } | ? { $_ -match '^\d+\.\d+\.\d+$' } | Sort-Object { [version]$_ } -Descending | ? { [version]$_ -ge [version]'6.0' } | ? { $_ -notin @( '10.0.0' ) }  # Exclude 10.0.0 since it is a bad release. See: https://github.com/joeyates/imap-backup/releases/tag/v10.0.1
